title: PBE having issues.
body: Pbe for me has reverted the runes and prices back to the original, is this normal?

replies.body: Always be sure to check the PBE Boards for updates on PBE content. We posted a list of these changes recently, which you can find [**right over here**](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/gMnP2WiB-1019-thursday-pbe-status-faq)!
